latter.translation[1].definitions[0].def: being the second of two people or things, or the last in a list just mentioned
latter.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: In the latter case, buyers pay a 15% commission.
latter.translation[1].definitions[1].def: the latter part of a period of time is nearest to the end of it
latter.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Celebrations are planned for the latter part of November.
